data.title: Toronto Raptors Roster
data.meta_description: Toronto Raptors scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Andrea Bargnani was selected as the #1 pick in the First Round of the 2006 NBA Draft by the Toronto Raptors. Andrea Bargnani signed a multi-year contract with the Toronto Raptors on July 1, 2006. Andrea Bargnani signed a multi-year extension with the Toronto Raptors on July 8, 2009.

Chris Bosh was selected as the #4 pick in the First Round of the 2003 NBA Draft by the Toronto Raptors. Chris Bosh signed a multi-year contract with the Toronto Raptors on July 7, 2003. Chris Bosh signed a multi-year extension with the Toronto Raptors on July 14, 2006.

DeMar DeRozan was selected as the #9 pick in the First Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Toronto Raptors. DeMar DeRozan signed a multi-year contract with the Toronto Raptors on July 9, 2009.

Marcus Banks was acquired in a trade by the Toronto Raptors from the Miami Heat on February 13, 2009.

Marco Belinelli was acquired in a trade by the Toronto Raptors from the Golden State Warriors on July 30, 2009.

Reggie Evans was acquired in a trade by the Toronto Raptors from the Philadelphia Sixers on June 9, 2009.

Amir Johnson was acquired in a trade by the Toronto Raptors from the Milwaukee Bucks on August 18, 2009.

Patrick O'Bryant was acquired in a trade by the Toronto Raptors from the Boston Celtics on February 19, 2009.

Hedo Turkoglu was acquired in a sign and trade by the Toronto Raptors from the Orlando Magic on July 9, 2009.

Sonny Weems was acquired in a trade by the Toronto Raptors from the Milwaukee Bucks on August 18, 2009.

Antoine Wright was acquired in a trade by the Toronto Raptors from the Dallas Mavericks on July 9, 2009.
